00020 using namespace TTEthernetModel;
00021 
00022 Define_Module( TTEInput);
00023 
00024 simsignal_t TTEInput::ctDroppedSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00025 
00026 void TTEInput::initialize()
00027 {
00028     ctDroppedSignal = registerSignal("ctDropped");
00029 }
00030 
00031 void TTEInput::addIncoming(uint16 ctID, Incoming *incoming)
00032 {
00033     incomings[ctID].push_back(incoming);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void TTEInput::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00037 {
00038     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00039     {
00040         EtherFrame *frame = (EtherFrame*) msg;
00041         //Auf CTCs verteilen oder BE traffic
00042         if (isCT(frame))
00043         {
00044             std::map<uint16, std::list<Incoming *> >::iterator incomingList = incomings.find(getCTID(frame));
00045             if (incomingList != incomings.end())
00046             {
00047                 //Send to all CTCs for the CT-ID
00048                 for (std::list<Incoming*>::iterator incoming = incomingList->second.begin(); incoming
00049                         != incomingList->second.end(); incoming++)
00050                 {
00051                     sendDirect(frame->dup(), (*incoming)->gate("in"));
00052                 }
00053                 delete frame;
00054             }
00055             else
00056             {
00057                 ev << "No incoming traffic allowed for CT ID " << getCTID(frame) << endl;
00058                 bubble("Frame not allowed here!");
00059                 emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00060                 delete frame;
00061             }
00062         }
00063         //Sonst BE
00064         else
00065         {
00066             send(msg, "out");
00067         }
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void TTEInput::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00072     ctMask = (unsigned int)par("ct_mask").longValue();
00073     ctMarker = (unsigned int)par("ct_marker").longValue();
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool TTEInput::isCT(EtherFrame *frame)
00077 {
00078     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00079     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00080     //Check for ct
00081     if ((((macBytes[0] << 24) | (macBytes[1] << 16) | (macBytes[2] << 8) | (macBytes[3])) & ctMask) == (ctMarker
00082             & ctMask))
00083     {
00084         return true;
00085     }
00086     //TODO More checking ?
00087     return false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 uint16 TTEInput::getCTID(EtherFrame *frame)
00091 {
00092     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00093     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00094     return (macBytes[4] << 8) | macBytes[5];
00095 }
